reference.shortdesc: The change summary includes a brief description of the change.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The change-summary element contains the portion of the release note that might appear in a document.
section.draft-comment: How/when would the change-summary appear in a document?

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The change-summary element is specialized from data. It is defined in the release management domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the change summary can be used to provide a brief description of a change:
example.codeblock: <change-historylist> <change-item product="productA"> <change-person>Tom Cihak</change-person> <change-completed>2019-06-07</change-completed> <change-summary>Made change 2 to product A</change-summary> <data>Details of change 2</data> </change-item> <change-historylist>
